welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kamikita-kita, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and cultural heritage. We invite you to immerse yourself in our rich history and breathtaking scenery, and make unforgettable memories during your stay here. Soak in the local traditions and indulge in our delicious cuisine, and let Kamikita-kita enchant you."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aomori Airport provides a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Aomori Airport serves flights within Japan and offers convenient amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Misawa Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Misawa Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
